description: The victim, a man in his 20s, suffered life-changing injuries after the attack but survived.
title: Men accused of attempted murder after Boxing Day attack
title_page: Bristol: Men accused of attempted murder after Boxing Day attack - BBC News
maintext:
Four men have been charged with attempted murder after a stabbing on Boxing Day in 2023.
The victim, a man in his 20s, suffered life-changing injuries after the attack in Bishop Road, Bristol, on 26 December 2023. He survived the attack.
Reuben Fay, 19, of Lockleaze, and Tayshon Graham, 20, of Easton, Ajay Edwards, 21, of Slough and Cain Henderson, 24, of Horfield are jointly accused of attempted murder.
All four have been remanded in custody and will appear at Bristol Crown Court on 21 March.
